html: Blender is awesome. I have used it in almost all my projects. Blender needs help. I happily did my part. Lets do what we can.
I am attending Siggraph Asia at Hong Kong. I will present GenLit in Room: S423/S424, Level 4 @ 13:50 on 15 of Dec.
GenLit is accepted at SIGGRAPH Asia 2025.
FLARE: Preprocessed data and model weights released for 9 subjects here!!
I started my Ph.D. at Max-Planck Institute for Intelligent Systems.
Check out our paper SPARK that is accepted in SIGGRAPH Asia 2024.
FLARE is accepted at SIGGRAPH Asia 2023 in the Journal Track.
I started my internship at Perceiving Systems.
I completed my masters degree in Machine Learning at the University of Tuebingen.
I finished my internship at the Indian Institute of Science.
